programme.title: Hispania rally 2020
programme.desc: Hispania Rally took place in Guadix - Granada in 2020. It achieved to host more than 180 participants from more than 26 countries. What the Hispania Rally strong as well as unique is the hard to drive, Gorafe desert. This extraordinary location has led the Hispania Rally to be recognized as the only European rally that takes place in the sandy and hot desert.

programme.title: Panafrica rally 2019
programme.desc: The Panafrica Rally is considered a one of a kind event. It combines every level of rider over some really demanding stages. It's a great practice for the professionals and the best school for the rookies. With its diverse geography spanning from the Atlantic Ocean, to the mountains and to the Sahara Desert, well known for its challenging terrain, endless sand dunes, rocky mountains and powder road, Morocco is the perfect venue for this even. With wide open tracks and astonishing landscapes, it's hard to find a more challenging rally venue. This year the race is moving from Erfoud to Merzouga, with professional and rookie participants from over 14 different nationalities. Panafrica Rally is ready to unfold new challenging routes on a 6-day event navigating more than 1400 km.

programme.title: Sailing to tokyo 2019/
programme.desc: This monthly magazine is dedicated to the story of Olympic Sailing, as the world's stars names and best rookies strive to compete on the world's greatest sports stage and claim their medals at the Olympic Games. To be a champion you need power, strength, skill, mental toughness, supreme fitness and strategy. Broadcast by over 20 broadcasters in more than 95 countries, Sailing to Tokyo follows the long journey and defining moments in athletes' careers as they aspire to make Olympic history.

programme.title: Sports max
programme.desc: Sports Max highlights the latest extreme and alternative sports from around the globe, including mountain biking, surfing, snowboarding, kiteboarding, skateboarding, rock climbing, kayaking, skydiving, freeskiing, freestyle motocross, BMX, extreme big mountain skiing & snowboarding, parkour and many more.

programme.title: Paragliding world cup
programme.desc: The Paragliding World Cup Superfinal was staged in Roldanillo, Colombia with ten days of high level competition flying in one of the best paragliding venues in the world. One-hundred and twenty-two pilots competed, including 18 previous overall World Cup winners and 12 Women World Cup winners, ranking it as one of the toughest line-ups ever to face each other. Suspended in the air, this adventure sport features cross-country racing, with pilots needing to be an expert in understanding the impact of terrain on weather conditions.

programme.title: GP racing
programme.desc: The show delves into the world of F1 technology where teams try to gain split second advantages over their rivals with cutting-edge engineering. GP Racing covers the colorful global spectacle that is the F1 World Championship.

programme.title: Better than four : Cape To Cape Mtb - Part 2
programme.desc: Initially a bi-weekly (26×26') sports series with a difference, 'Better Than Four' brings viewers all the action from all things two-wheeled. As well as profiling past, present and future heroes of cycling, 'Better Than Four' includes news features and highlights from the very latest events. Each episode is also packed with tips and tricks to try at home, as well as reviews of the latest kit, equipment and cycling films. Changing gears from traditional cycling coverage, 'Better Than Four' takes viewers to new, exotic locations, from the volcano bike-ride in Bali to jungle biking around the Mayan temples of South America. Each episode will include up to 3 segments covering cycling and biking events from all over the world. With amazing footage and commentary from experienced cyclists, daredevil skills and awe-inspiring camerawork, this groundbreaking show is a must for cycling enthusiasts and novices alike.

programme.title: Xterra adventure/
programme.desc: XTERRA is the world's premier off-road multisport event. An extreme competition, the XTERRA format combines swimming with mountain biking and trail running. It has been described as one part triathlon, one part mountain bike race, and one part "survival of the fittest". The typical distances are a 1.5k swim, 30k mountain bike, and 10k trail run.

programme.title: Xterra adventure/

programme.title: Jet ski world series
programme.desc: Hair-raising to say the least, the trusted steeds deliver up to a whopping 500 horsepower, going from 0-100km/hr. in under 3.8 seconds - putting the 'Jet' in Jet Ski. Wearing no protective body, grappling with the waves, and fighting it out with gravity, no wonder it is often said that these riders are some of the most courageous athletes in the world. Let us kick off this year's season with our first stop in Poland!

programme.title: Rolex new york yacht club invitational cup
programme.desc: Welcome to Rolex New York Yacht Club Invitational Cup. The Rolex New York Yacht Club Invitational Cup is hosted at the prestigious New York Yacht Club Harbour Court venue in Newport, Rhode Island.

programme.title: Hispania rally 2020
programme.desc: Hispania Rally took place in Guadix - Granada in 2020. It achieved to host more than 180 participants from more than 26 countries. What the Hispania Rally strong as well as unique is the hard to drive, Gorafe desert. This extraordinary location has led the Hispania Rally to be recognized as the only European rally that takes place in the sandy and hot desert.

programme.title: Panafrica rally 2019 #1
programme.desc: The Panafrica Rally is considered a one of a kind event. It combines every level of rider over some really demanding stages. It's a great practice for the professionals and the best school for the rookies. With its diverse geography spanning from the Atlantic Ocean, to the mountains and to the Sahara Desert, well known for its challenging terrain, endless sand dunes, rocky mountains and powder road, Morocco is the perfect venue for this even. With wide open tracks and astonishing landscapes, it's hard to find a more challenging rally venue. This year the race is moving from Erfoud to Merzouga, with professional and rookie participants from over 14 different nationalities. Panafrica Rally is ready to unfold new challenging routes on a 6-day event navigating more than 1400 km.

The races were contested with GT3-spec cars, GT4-spec cars, sports cars and 24H-Specials, like silhouette cars.

programme.title: 4 deserts race #1
programme.desc: Welcome to the world of the 4 Deserts Race Series, the only international ultramarathon series which mixes local culture with trail running. The 4 Deserts Race Series is widely recognized as one of the most prestigious outdoor running series in the world. It is made up of 4 of the most iconic and toughest races in the world - the Sahara Race in Egypt and Namibia, the Gobi March between China and Mongolia, the Atacama Crossing in Chile and The Last Desert in Antarctica. Competitors traverse 250 kilometers in seven days over rough country terrain with only a place in a tent and water provided and support from the very best operational and medical teams provided. Through this documentary, we will travel to two destinations of the 2017 4 Deserts race calendar; China for the Gobi March in the great Gobi Desert and Chile for the Atacama Crossing in the Atacama Desert, an area of extraordinary beauty and astounding natural wonders.

programme.title: Qatar cross country rally 2020 #1
programme.desc: Manateq Qatar Cross-Country Rally signaled the opening round of the FIA World Cup for Cross-Country Rallies at the stunning, awe-inspiring state of Qatar. Organised by the Qatar Motor and Motorcycle Federation (QMMF), the event has attracted 33 teams and competitors from 17 nations. Five days of intense competition and 1,444.99 kilometres in the challenging Qatar desert, will test cars and drivers to their limits. Although the event has attracted many teams and competitors, the 3-time Dakar winner Nasser Saleh Al-Attiyah stands out prominently. Al-Attiyah has proven to be a force to be reckoned within the cross-country rally scene. Only just missing the mark in the last Dakar Rally, the born and bred Qatari will be keen to compete and impress on home soil.

programme.title: Xterra adventure - 2020: xterra adventure - 2020 #
programme.desc: XTERRA is the world's premier off-road multisport event. An extreme competition, the XTERRA format combines swimming with mountain biking and trail running. It has been described as one part triathlon, one part mountain bike race, and one part "survival of the fittest". The typical distances are a 1.5k swim, 30k mountain bike, and 10k trail run.

programme.title: Cape epic 2019: cape epic 2019 #
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through roughly 700km of unspoilt scenery and 15 000m of accumulated climbing, over some of the most magnificent mountain passes in Western Cape in South Africa. The Absa Cape Epic is the most televised mountain bike stage race in the world and the only eight-day mountain bike stage race classed as hors catégorie by the Union Cycliste Internationale (UCI). This official UCI status makes it a highlight on the professional racer's calendar. The Absa Cape Epic also attracts aspiring amateur riders wanting to test themselves against the best. It is a full-service race, meaning that everything is taken care of from the start - all riders need to think about is riding.

programme.title: Better than four: better than four #
programme.desc: Initially a bi-weekly (26×26') sports series with a difference, 'Better Than Four' brings viewers all the action from all things two-wheeled. As well as profiling past, present and future heroes of cycling, 'Better Than Four' includes news features and highlights from the very latest events. Each episode is also packed with tips and tricks to try at home, as well as reviews of the latest kit, equipment and cycling films. Changing gears from traditional cycling coverage, 'Better Than Four' takes viewers to new, exotic locations, from the volcano bike-ride in Bali to jungle biking around the Mayan temples of South America. Each episode will include up to 3 segments covering cycling and biking events from all over the world. With amazing footage and commentary from experienced cyclists, daredevil skills and awe-inspiring camerawork, this groundbreaking show is a must for cycling enthusiasts and novices alike.
